body: I'm really worried that once the raw trace is transformed the scopes won't make any sense (e.g. when you fuse two ops that are in neighbouring scopes, where do they end up)? 😕 It shouldn't be to hard to move this to `TracingState`
body_html: I'm really worried that once the raw trace is transformed the scopes won't make any sense (e.g. when you fuse two ops that are in neighbouring scopes, where do they end up)? 😕 It shouldn't be to hard to move this to TracingState
